name: artists_search
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool songmeanings.
Tool description: Easily follow and track your favorite artists on SongMeanings!
Be the first to know about new lyrics, song meanings & more!
API description: Search the SongMeanings database for artist names and aliases using various query parameters.

q.description: The query string used to search for artist names and aliases.

page.description: The starting page of results. Defaults to '1'.

page_size.description: The number of results returned per page. Defaults to '25'.

matchmode.description: Configure how matching occurs (see further parameter values)
